casebody.data:
Martin J. PRAISNER, Jr.
v.
STATE of Connecticut Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 12, 2019

David C. Yale, in support of the petition.

Emily V. Melendez, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 189 Conn. App. 540, 208 A.3d 667 (2019), is granted, limited to the following issue:

"Did the Appellate Court properly hold that a university police officer is not a member of a 'local police department' entitled to indemnification under General Statutes § 53-39a ?"
